uk.co.optimisticpanda.gtest.dto.condition
Class CombinedCondition

java.lang.Object
  uk.co.optimisticpanda.gtest.dto.condition.CombinedCondition
All Implemented Interfaces:
ICondition
public class CombinedCondition
extends java.lang.Object
implements ICondition

This condition wraps multiple conditions and returns the combined effects of its ICondition.isValid(int, Object) methods.

This Condition is configured by the use of CombinedCondition.BoolOp to determine whether all IConditions need to be valid or just one for this CombinedCondition to be valid.

Author:
Andy Lee

Nested Class Summary
static class CombinedCondition.BoolOp
          An enum that is used to determine how the effects of the conditions are combined.

public <D> boolean isValid(int index,

Description copied from interface: ICondition
See if the rule is valid for this dto and index. This is used to determine if the effects of an edit should be applied.

Specified by:
